detaileddescription.para:
Signal function of the message box
mbox
pointer to a message box object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Resize the button holder to fit
mbox
pointer to message box object

Create a message box objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new message box
copy
pointer to a message box object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created message box

Add button to the message box
mbox
pointer to message box object
btn_map
button descriptor (button matrix map). E.g. a const char *txt[] = {"ok", "close", ""} (Can not be local variable)

Set the text of the message box
mbox
pointer to a message box
txt
a '\0' terminated character string which will be the message box text

Set animation duration
mbox
pointer to a message box object
anim_time
animation length in milliseconds (0: no animation)

Automatically delete the message box after a given time
mbox
pointer to a message box object
delay
a time (in milliseconds) to wait before delete the message box

Stop the auto. closing of message box
mbox
pointer to a message box object

Set a style of a message box
mbox
pointer to a message box object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Set whether recoloring is enabled
btnm
pointer to button matrix object
en
whether recoloring is enabled

Get the text of the message box
mbox
pointer to a message box object
pointer to the text of the message box

Get the index of the lastly "activated" button by the user (pressed, released etc) Useful in the the event_cb.
btnm
pointer to button matrix object
index of the last released button (LV_BTNM_BTN_NONE: if unset)

Get the text of the lastly "activated" button by the user (pressed, released etc) Useful in the the event_cb.
btnm
pointer to button matrix object
text of the last released button (NULL: if unset)

Get the animation duration (close animation time)
mbox
pointer to a message box object
animation length in milliseconds (0: no animation)

Get a style of a message box
mbox
pointer to a message box object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to a style

Get whether recoloring is enabled
mbox
pointer to a message box object
whether recoloring is enabled

Get message box button matrix
mbox
pointer to a message box object
pointer to button matrix object
return value will be NULL unless lv_mbox_add_btns has been already called
